summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.1°C) and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 1.9 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 2525 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1772 m), light levels (up 8166 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 878.8m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and near calm conditions. Some rain can be expected, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
